page.title: 09Religion
page.content: {My Church:}I go to Trinity Baptist Church.We sing a hymn,then pray,then another hymn followed by an offering and then another hymn.The man preaches about the Bible and I became a Christian so I was saved. {My Sunday School:}On a Sunday morning I get up early to go to Sunday School.My mum takes me.I started because I am a Christian.I was saved from sin.We do lots of things and do plays about the Bible,like walking on water.After Sunday School we go into church and are blessed. {The Mosque:}I{have}to go to church.It is no ordinary church,it is a mosque. It is the most important thing for the Moslems,who worship Mohammed,"peace be on him".When we are in the mosque we have to read our Subuck.When we read this to our teacher and we do not know it we get the stick.
